sentence: According to the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, Parnell endorsed Senate candidate Dave McCormick and appeared with him at a March 15 event in Homestead, Pa.
author: George Stockburger
title: Sean Parnell, former Senate candidate, endorses McSwain for Governor

sentence: Celebrity physician-turned Senate candidate Dr. Mehmet Oz and several others at the conservative Pennsylvania Leadership Conference forum Saturday did not debate each other, but many took turns jabbing at Dave McCormick over his wealth and alleged ties to China.
author: Thomas Phippen
title: Pennsylvania GOP Senate primary: Dr. Oz, other candidates swipe at absent McCormick during forum

author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Trump suggests he’ll decide on Pennsylvania GOP Senate endorsement in ‘about a week’

sentence: The endorsement came after months of behind-the-scenes jockeying by Oz and another leading candidate in Pennsylvania, Dave McCormick, a hedge fund executive.
author: Sarah Fortinsky
title: Trump endorses Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvania Senate race

sentence: Trump’s endorsement comes two days after a The Hill/Emerson College poll found Oz and hedge fund manager Dave McCormick to be neck-and-neck ahead of the May 17 primary.
author: Katherine Huggins
title: Trump Backs Dr. Oz’s Pennsylvania Senate Bid, Cites Doc’s Diagnosis That He’s in ‘Extraordinary Health’ in Glowing Endorsement

sentence: At issue among Trump’s most fervent supporters is the belief that Oz, a Turkish-American TV physician who has hobnobbed with Hollywood’s elite and has flip-flopped on the issue of abortion, isn’t a trustworthy “America First” Republican candidate, compared to fellow candidate Dave McCormick, who has ex-Trump administration officials Hope Hicks and Stephen Miller by his side.
title: Trumpworld Goes Into Meltdown After Trump Endorses Dr. Oz

sentence: At issue among Trump’s most fervent supporters is the belief that Oz, a Turkish-American TV physician who has hobnobbed with Hollywood’s elite and has flip-flopped on the issue of abortion, isn’t a trustworthy “America First” Republican candidate, compared to fellow candidate Dave McCormick, who has ex-Trump administration official Hope Hicks by his side.
author: Zachary Petrizzo
title: Trumpworld Goes Into Meltdown After Trump Endorses Dr. Oz

sentence: Oz is the antithesis of everything that made Trump the best president of my lifetime—he’s the farthest thing from America First & he’d be very bad for PA https://t.co/kuTo4pp53U — Sean Parnell (@SeanParnellUSA) April 9, 2022 Dave McCormick, who is a former George W. Bush administration official and is married to Dina Powell, a former deputy national security adviser to Trump, was also in the running for his endorsement but did not get it even though he leads Oz, according to recent polls.
author: Terresa Monroe-Hamilton
title: Conservatives react very badly to Donald Trump’s endorsement of Dr. Oz
